KSRobot_IOT.Wifi_setup|block: KSRobot WIFI 設定| TXD %txd| RXD %rxd| SSID %ssid| 密碼 %passwd| 模式 %ap
KSRobot_IOT.ThingSpeak_set|block: 傳送到 ThingSpeak| Write API key = %api_key|  Field 1 = %field1|| Field 2 = %field2| Field 3 = %field3| Field 4 = %field4| Field 5 = %field5| Field 6 = %field6| Field 7 = %field7| Field 8 = %field8
KSRobot_IOT.IFTTT_set|block: 傳送到 IFTTT| 事件名稱 = %event_name| 存取金鑰 = %api_key| Value 1 = %value1|| Value 2 = %value2| Value 3 = %value3
KSRobot_IOT.MQTT_set|block: 連接到 MQTT| 伺服器 %host| 埠 %port| ID %clientId| 帳戶 %username| 密碼 %pwd

KSRobot_IOT.MQTTPublish1|block: 發送 MQTT 訊息到 %top 資料 %payload
